actions.text: Referred to House Committee on the Judiciary.

official_title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to facilitate entry into the United States of the alien parent of a minor U.S. citizen if the other parent is a U.S. citizen.

summary.text: Provides, under the Immigration and Nationality Act, for the entry into the United States of the alien parent of a minor U.S. citizen if the other parent is a U.S. citizen.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Immigration and Nationality Act to facilitate entry into the United States of the alien parent of a minor U.S. citizen if the other parent is a U.S. citizen.
